features: Notion Template + Google Sheets Template; 4 Tasks for Each Page Type; 75 Total Tasks; Priority Calculation; One Visual Example for Each Task; Awesome Dashboard; Lifetime Access; Everything in basic; Notion Template + Google Sheets Template; 372 Conversion Kicker Tasks
